prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Donated by Ruth Ann Chitwood in 2001 as part of the W. R. Chitwood Collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This volume contains minutes from meetings of the Wytheville Development Company, a real estate development company, from 11 August 1900 to 22 May 1915. The bulk of minutes occur between 1900 and 1908. No entries exist for 1909-1912; the last three entries are for meetings in 1913 and 1915. Charter members of the Wytheville Development Company as revealed by the minute book included John H. Fulton, Robert Enoch Withers, J. C. Blair, H. L. Poge, W. S. Trinkle, Edmund Pendleton, and G. S. Sexton.
